extracted_information: Detailed information on PandaDoc's document template features, integration capabilities, and relevant temporal context for 2025.

features.name: Document Generation
features.description: Automate document creation using customizable templates.

features.name: Token/Variable System
features.description: Utilizes built-in variables for sending unique documents, particularly with features like Bulk Send and Smart Content to personalize documents based on recipient inputs.

features.name: Template Editor
details: Drag & Drop Editor: A block-based document builder for creating digital documents.
Custom Branding & Themes: Allows creation of professional-looking documents with custom branding.
Content Library: Stores layouts and branded assets for rapid document creation.

features.name: Conditional Logic
details: Smart Content: Adapts document content to recipient's requirements and inputs, minimizing back-and-forth.
CPQ (Configure Price Quote): Generates error-free quotes tailored for specific buyers, implying underlying conditional logic for pricing and product configuration.

features.name: Integration Capabilities
features.description: Offers an API for custom integrations and provides detailed developer documentation.

temporal_info.basis: The webpage footer indicates 'Â© 2025 PandaDoc Inc. All rights reserved.', suggesting the information presented is current and relevant for the year 2025.
